QuestData.Title: Into the Clearing
QuestData.Description: Irontree Clearing must be razed. We can afford no mercy if we want to prevent the goblins from spreading their destruction through the entire forest.$B$BAlton Redding, my most trusted protector, has already led much of the pack around the enemy line to strike while they are distracted here. Seek him out to the west, overlooking Irontree Cavern.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Alton Redding near Irontree Cavern.
QuestData.RewardText: Welcome to the pack, $r. Let's hope you don't mind getting a bit uncivilized.
